spatial_accuracy.notes: General footprint and room placement are highly accurate. Minor discrepancy in the Living Room fireplace wall depth and Garage access door positioning.

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent adherence to wall thicknesses and adjacency. All rooms (Master, Bed 2, 3, 4, Study, Garage) are present. Door swing directions are largely correct.

furniture_mapping.notes: Kitchen island and cabinetry match well. Sofa placement in Living Room is logical though more elaborate than plan indicators. Bathroom fixtures align with the schematic.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean isometric projection with professional soft lighting. Occasional Z-fighting/clipping on some door frames, but visual clarity is high.

detected_errors.description: The fireplace/media unit in the living room is slightly shifted compared to the 2D plan representation.
The kitchen island length appears elongated relative to the walkway space in the 2D plan.
Minor geometry aliasing where the door frames meet the wall headers in the hallway section.
